mapper.select: select E_BOOK_NUM, E_BOOK_TITLE, E_BOOK_WRITER, E_BOOK_PUBLISHER, E_BOOK_TAG from E_BOOK order by E_BOOK_NUM desc limit #{displayPost}, #{postNum};
mapper.insert: insert into E_BOOK(E_BOOK_TITLE, E_BOOK_WRITER, E_BOOK_TRANSLATER, E_BOOK_PUBLISHER, E_BOOK_DATE, E_BOOK_INFO, E_BOOK_INDEX, E_BOOK_IMG_NAME, E_BOOK_TAG ) values(#{E_BOOK_TITLE}, #{E_BOOK_WRITER}, #{E_BOOK_TRANSLATER}, #{E_BOOK_PUBLISHER}, #{E_BOOK_DATE}, #{E_BOOK_INFO}, #{E_BOOK_INDEX}, #{E_BOOK_IMG_NAME}, #{E_BOOK_TAG})
